Articles.Content:
I come back from the dead as fungus zombie ultra boss. I summon more undead hill-claimers to my will.

My hill.

I make the undead and zombie ultraboss die by tempting them to run off the hill by placing a juicy corpse to the side, then dropping an enormous anvil on them. I thrn climb onto the hill, plant a flag, and set up a refreshments table. My hill with delicious refreshments and a giant anvil.

I build big rocket to push the planet along with your head zombies, anvil and refreshments into the sun.

I sit on own hill on minmus and eat ever lasting icecream.
I melt Minmus and your hill before building a new one in interstellar space. My interstellar hill.

I rebuilds the universe.

No one's hill.

I walk up to a hill and have a picnic.

My hill with a picnic.

I kick you into a well. A volcano well, that is. You burn to ashes.

My hill with a half-eaten picnic.

I eat the rest of the picnic, and then wrap you in the tablecloth and roll you down the hill.

My hill.

I come back up the hill and kick you into Jack and Jill. I am prepared to kick any incoming hill claimers.

My hill.

I build a taller hill next to your hill, so it casts a permanent shadow on it.

My shadow inducing hill.

I hit you in the head with a shovel. I bury you under the hill (~30 ft of dirt & rock).

My hill and buried alive hill claimer.

slowly the giant odin's hand was pulled from the warp and then purged by the forces of the emperor the hand reverts back to the state of my last post. i then move the hand in to intergalactic space where it will reside for all eternity in the honor of Odin the mountain top moderator.

no ones hill.
Hmm. It seems that both hills go unclaimed. My hillz. (Yes, with a "z")

I re-create the Overmind (who is subservient to me) and over-run your hills with zerglings. I then calmly walk up the hills and claim them.

My zerg infested hills.

i get games workshop to sue you for using a product that is too similar to theirs. there by causing your Zergs to cease to exist in which i claim the hill by throwing you into space

my hill(odins hand) for a change

Blizzard counter-sue, because the Zerg is theirs, and you get thrown off of the hill into space as well.

No-one's hill.

I build a giant calculator and then divide by 0 a million times......then plant a flag,

my hill surrounded with deadly black holes. -

The black holes suck up the surrounding landscape, planet, atmosphere, and immediate solar system. Then they run out of material, and explode.

I claim a bump on Halley's Comet and call it my hill.

odin's hand resets due to the power of her/his moderating powers.

nobody's hill

boom

odin is dead

i planted dynamite in his intestines

Mr. Nobel's hill.

Rams you with my giant coal powered train that places rails in front of it.

In the name of progress I claim this hill!

i pick up the tracks that your train leaves behind then throw them and the train off Odin's Hand. then resurrect Odin from the dead.

still MGUARN's hill

I sit on said hill and clam it as mine. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My hill

i shoot Tidus and Odin. Also Odin is too dead to be brought back now.

My hill.

Thor smites you with a lighting bolt for killing Odin. I walk past your smoking remains and claim the hill.

My hill.
